title: Start of The Office
description: The Office premieres on NBC. The series starts with the introduction of Dunder Mifflin Paper Company's Scranton branch and its employees.

title: Jim confesses his feelings
description: Jim confesses his feelings to Pam and they share their first kiss.

title: Michael Scott starts 'The Michael Scott Paper Company'
description: After being forced to resign from Dunder Mifflin, Michael starts his own paper company.

title: Jim proposes to Pam
description: Jim proposes to Pam at a gas station.

title: Dunder Mifflin is sold to Sabre
description: Dunder Mifflin is sold to printer company Sabre.

title: Michael Scott leaves Dunder Mifflin
description: Michael Scott leaves Dunder Mifflin to move to Colorado with Holly Flax.

title: Dwight becomes the regional manager
description: After many years of aspiring to the position, Dwight finally becomes the regional manager of Dunder Mifflin Scranton branch.

title: End of The Office
description: The series ends with all the employees of Dunder Mifflin coming together for a panel discussion about the documentary and Dwight and Angela's wedding.
